definition: suffix of a noun of locality
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: The name for this border between lunar night and day is the terminator line.
sentences.chinese: 我們把月亮上的黑白邊界線叫做‘晨昏線’。

sentences.english: An abandoned military road, overgrown with weeds, marked the former boundary line.
sentences.chinese: 一條長滿野草的廢棄軍用公路標示出以前的邊界線。

sentences.english: This paper analyses all kinds of possible situations of boundary for the reason of administrative division readjustment.
sentences.chinese: 分析了行政區劃調整可能引起邊界線變化的各種情況。

sentences.english: On this basis, the surge boundary line of the compressor was determined.
sentences.chinese: 在此基礎上，確定了壓氣機的喘振邊界線。

sentences.english: Corner-to-corner edges can serve as ridges and valleys.
sentences.chinese: 角和角之間的邊界線可以作爲山谷。

sentences.english: The discovery was made just a few centimeters below what became the K-T boundary line.
sentences.chinese: 這一發現是隻是一個幾釐米低於成爲KT邊界線。

sentences.english: The boundary which had first passed was readopt by a large vote.
sentences.chinese: 第一次通過的邊界線已過大多數投票通過再予採用。

sentences.english: PIXY Can you see any borders from here ?
sentences.chinese: 從這裏看的到那條邊界線嗎？

sentences.english: This algorithm can be used effectively to imitate various complex curves and borderlines.
sentences.chinese: 此法可以有效地用於各種複雜曲線及邊界線模擬。

sentences.english: The river determines the natural boundary between the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 這條河流成爲這兩國間的天然邊界線。

sentences.english: The ball rolled to a standstill just short of the boundary.
sentences.chinese: 球快滾到邊界線時停了下來。

sentences.english: The terms of the agreement respect the  boundary line between the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 協議的條款涉及兩國間的邊界線。

sentences.english: Specifies the thickness of the drawing "pen" for lines and bounding lines of shapes.
sentences.chinese: 指定繪圖厚度的“筆”形狀的線條和邊界線。

sentences.english: They admit a border line cases.
sentences.chinese: 它們承認一個邊界線案例。

sentences.english: Therefore, finding the FOV lines precisely becomes the key to the problem.
sentences.chinese: 因此，精確生成視野邊界線成了解決問題的關鍵所在。

definition: Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region, abbr. 寧|宁[Ning2], capital Yinchuan 銀川|银川[Ying2 chuan1]
pinyin: Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1

definition: important matter that must be kept secret (idiom); don't breathe a word of it to anyone!
